ValidationRule.description: When Resolution type 'Reduced services in order to retain' is selected, populate New Annual Revenue, Dropped Services Revenue, Dropped Services, and Reason for Dropped Services fields.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Case_Lookup__r.Reason , 'Reactive') && ISPICKVAL(Resolution_Type_Details__c , 'Reduced services to retain') && (ISBLANK(New_Annual_Revenue__c ) || ISBLANK(Dropped_Service_Revenue__c ) || ISBLANK(Dropped_Services__c) || ISPICKVAL(Reason_for_Dropped_Services__c,'') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: New Annual Revenue, Dropped Service Revenue, and Dropped Services and Reason for Dropped Services fields are required when 'Reduced services in order to retain' is selected in Resolution Type Details.
